course_title: Introduction to Writing for Graphic Forms

001.comments: All CRWR Winter Term 1 (September-December) courses/sections will be held online. For this particular course, students will have the option of attending scheduled live online lectures, or engaging with class on their own schedule, through recorded lectures and online discussion boards.

description: Techniques of and practice in creating, developing, and writing the graphic novel, manga, and other forms of illustrated writing. The ability to draw is not required. Manuscript submission is not required for admission.
